title: Morde is awesome, and was not transformed into another Riven?
body: Morde was not transformed into mechanics heavy champ with a loaded kit bc he was not one before.  Neither was Aatrox yet he was totally transformed into something he was not.  How is this fair?  All Aatrox players are very reluctant on all future reworks because how they were straight thrown under the bus.  If this was a lesson learned by Riot in terms of they are never doing that again, then why not fix their mistake when it comes to Aatrox?  Morde fans did not want a champ like Riven and didn't get one, they have to understand how poorly Aatrox mains continue to be treated.

True, new Aatrox feels meh for the most part, and is impossible to balance it seems. Why can't they just split the two of them into different champs and admit they messed up?
What other champs do you love?

I get that Aatrox mains from the past are upset. He’s definitely a complete different champion with the only similarity being a drain tank monster now. 

But I actually enjoy the new one a lot. I socialize in ap bruisers and juggernauts. And it’s so much fun playing Aatrox. Riven feels like your slicing through enemies with her sword but Aatrox, very different. You feel like you are smashing through bodies and I just can’t get enough of him. 

Again I definitely understand how much it would stink to lose what you’re used to (For me it was Swain) but I enjoy the new Aatrox.

There is  a lot of enjoyment to be found within LoL.  It should not come at the expense of others losing a champion they will never get back.  You can main other champs bc you like other champs.  Aatrox mains have no one to main bc they already liked Aatrox.  Morde was done so well bc Aatrox was done so poorly.
You mean you checked with both the other people who played pre-rework Aatrox, and neither one of them liked the rework?

Jokes are good if they are funny :P  

Aatrox had a solid community before his rework.  Some champs that get played a lot have no community while other less mainstream champs have strong ones.  But the rework was about money not people.  Team Fight Tactics shows what people really want and that game is the opposite of what Newtrox, Pyke, and Akali represent.  Malphite, Amumu, and old-Aatrox in LoL represent to what TFT is about, which people greatly desire.  Game declining the way it has is no accident.

Team Fight Tactics release will show how much people love champs with tons of outplay mechanics that can carry.

Aatrox needs a rework that makes his kit a hybrid of his old and current one. 

Q is now his 3rd Q attack and dashes a bit further.
W remains the same.
E is now his current passive but he fires two energy blades like his old E used to. Aatrox's actual blade can heal off all champions hit but only heals for 5% beyond the first champion hit.

Ult: Q becomes Dark Flight.

New passive - Warbringer: Aatrox now gains extra AS for 4 seconds when he displaces his target and is constantly refreshed when he's inside the AoE of his E.
Most people don't seem to realize that Aatrox's old design was the reason he was reworked.
revert shen.

Morse is another rework that has killed a champions identity and completely failed, and tbh nearly all reworks fail.  Riot need to stop reworking stuff and just focus on new stuff, reworks have no place in this game and never have

To a point this is universally true.  There are only really losers with reworks because whoever likes them, liked other stuff before and after.  While those that do not like it lost something they enjoyed and gained nothing.
